casebody.data:
Dr. E. C. POLLOCK, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6361. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 22, 1932. Wm. A. Green, of New Orleans, La., for appellant. Edmond E. Talbot, U. S. Atty., and P. M. Flanagan, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of New Orleans, La.

Before BRYAN, FOSTER, and SIB-LEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
